nodes.text: Rothana Heavy Engineering (or RHE for short) was a subsidiary of the shipbuilding corporation Kuat Drive Yards. During the Clone Wars, RHE designed and manufactured the Acclamator-class transgalactic military assault ships, the All Terrain Tactical Enforcers, the Low Altitude Assault Transport/infantry, Low Altitude Assault Transport carrier, and the Self-Propelled Heavy Artillery Turbolaser for the Galactic Republic. They also manufactured the JJ-e5 power cells.
